message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I really like the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you think $180 is a bit steep, but I've done some research and I know you really need this product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.

I can see you're really interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $155. It's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product.
I can see you're really trying to find a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll meet you at $152.50. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $152.50, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $142 for the product.

I've already made a lot of concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $150. That's the lowest price I can sell this product for and still make a profit. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my budget limit. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
